FairBNB.restAPIConnection.restAPIConnection module¶

class FairBNB.restAPIConnection.restAPIConnection.RestAPIConnection(filters=None, base_url='http://localhost:8888')¶

Bases: object

Every API call gets through this class first. It will store and apply filters.

get_listing_detail(res, custom_filters=None, append=True)¶
